file_content.text: We are being picked off one-by-one. We have doused our fire, but still they find us.
They seem to smell the Force in us; the light draws out their own darkness.
We were wrong. This is far worse than a plague. They cannot be saved. I hope we still can....
Masters Tre Trimbal and Luquena are dead.
They ventured too close to the lair and were attacked.
There was... something else... leading the rakghouls. It seemed impervious to the power of the Force.
I fear we've now drawn its attention.
We have set our camp near a rakghoul lair but have had little luck making contact with the creatures.
We take heart that our theories are sound, for there is a palpable dark side presence coming from the lair.
It is that influence we must combat to turn back the plague.
We are here on a mission of mercy. I am recording this holojournal to preserve our efforts for posterity.
All evidence indicates that rakghouls are not beasts but formerly sentient victims of a plague that mutates the body and mind.
It was Sith science that created the plague. And where the Force has corrupted, perhaps the Force can also heal....
